subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Stadiums and Arenas
Electric Light and Power
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The track and field stadium for the Rio de Janeiro Olympics was without power or water, with the city hall and the soccer club Botafogo blaming each other for unpaid utility bills.
snippet: The track and field stadium for the Rio de Janeiro Olympics was without power or water, with the city hall and the soccer club Botafogo blaming each other for unpaid utility bills.
